description.plain:
Buni is a drill rapper from London.
Formerly known as Nutkase prior to UK Drill blowing up in 2017.
Both him and Russ are a part of Splash Music Group (otherwise known as SMG).
Known for his consistently rude diss tracks towards various drill collectives such as Gulag, No Respawn, and Demon Rejects.

body.plain:
Buni is a drill rapper from London.
Formerly known as Nutkase prior to UK Drill blowing up in 2017.
Both him and Russ are a part of Splash Music Group (otherwise known as SMG).
Known for his consistently rude diss tracks towards various drill collectives such as Gulag, No Respawn, and Demon Rejects.

songs.title: No Respawn

description.plain:
“No Respawn” is the follow up to Demon Rejects by Russ’s brother Buni. Buni sends indirects to his opps despite naming no names, a rarity in a Buni track.
The title looks to be a play on No Remorse and continues with the video game imagery Buni has employed in many of his tracks

songs.embed_content: Read “No Respawn” by Buni on Genius

body.plain:
“No Respawn” is the follow up to Demon Rejects by Russ’s brother Buni. Buni sends indirects to his opps despite naming no names, a rarity in a Buni track.
The title looks to be a play on No Remorse and continues with the video game imagery Buni has employed in many of his tracks

songs.lyrics:
22 ContributorsNo Respawn Lyrics[Intro]
Hey, hey, listen up
Fuck the opps
Fuck the cops
Ayy, I swear Fermz and Renz patterned this?
Fuck yo dead homies, nigga
EBK, ABK, bitch

[Verse 1]
Send me the addy, I'm tracking it down
Spot me an opp, I'm running it down (Bang)
When he got shot, I was oh so proud
Gulag, how did he make it out? (How?)
He got boxed while running his mouth
He got left with his insides out
One try dash, lost and found
Tek man down, ying that down
Them man chat 'pon B
Rise and glee, fuck discreet (Bang)
How many your friends got put to sleep?
Hold your peace, lemme smoke my weed (Hold that)
Skeng in the ride, come see
Fuck postcode, don't rep no street (Fuck 'еm)
ABG, we glee
Violations leave you six feet deep (Bang)
Thеy turn shy when we talk about works, works
'Nuff of them man got hurt
He got hurt and he got burst
And the next one got put in a hearse (Dead boy)
Shit, shit could've turned out worse
Too many man got sent to the nurse
He got worked and his friend disperse
And the other one got covered with dirt (Dead boy)
I'm badder than bad
Temperament's nuts, turn psycho mad
Rise up my wap and take off hats
Slap and I slap, protect your yat
Scream "No cap", 'cah he left his hat
Real bad man, don't tek no chat
When he dashed, he didn't look back
Now his friend's all fucked, it's mad (Mad)
[Chorus]
Yo, bro-bro, where the opps at? Ping that (Ping)
No respawn when I swing that, ying dat (Ying)
One eye closed when I zing dat, zing dat
Best play dead, or we spin back, get back (Grrr)
Bad man ting, don't tek no chit-chat (Never)
But I'm known for the blick dat, blick dat (Blick dat)
Everyting red when I get back, get back (Blick dat)
Corn gon' fly when when I press that let back

[Verse 2]
Everyting fucked when my loadout drops
No VLK when I buss my shot (Bang)
Who's on what? Come, let's rock
Slide and pop, confirm that loss (Bang)
Numerous opps got whacked, some dropped
One coulda dropped, but I missed the drop
Flop, pissed, let's spin that block
Pop, slap this mash at your top
Yo, this likkle man wan' @ me
I advise you never to @ me
'Cah the last time one of them @ me
He got yinged in front of his gyallie (Ching, ching)
Patty, patty, a bunch of patties
Jump out the ride, get slappy (Slap, boy)
Jump out the ride, get slappy, tappy
Hoping that feds don't grab me (Dead up)
You might also like[Chorus]
Yo, bro-bro, where the opps at? Ping that (Ping)
No respawn when I swing that, ying dat (Ying)
One eye closed when I zing dat, zing dat
Best play dead, or we spin back, get back (Grrr)
Bad man ting, don't tek no chit-chat (Never)
But I'm known for the blick dat, blick dat (Blick dat)
Everyting red when I get back, get back (Blick dat)
Corn gon' fly when when I press that let back3Embed

songs.title: Demon Rejects

description.plain: A serious diss track towards Block 6, Buni spends just under three minutes talking on how Block 6 OG’s such as Omz A6 and Ghostface600 aren’t on job, and the rest of Block 6 are fake drillers who have never done any work on the road.

songs.embed_content: Read “Demon Rejects” by Buni on Genius

body.plain: A serious diss track towards Block 6, Buni spends just under three minutes talking on how Block 6 OG’s such as Omz A6 and Ghostface600 aren’t on job, and the rest of Block 6 are fake drillers who have never done any work on the road.

songs.lyrics:
23 ContributorsDemon Rejects Lyrics[Intro]
Ay, I swear Fermz and Renz patterned this
Bow
Ya yo, ya yo
Biggz The Engineer, baby

[Verse 1]
First things first
Let's talk about facts and works
Your boy Omz ain't mashed no works
Talk about guns, you ain't on that works (Never)
And to make shit worse
I got all five, that's real blood first
He got yinged and he got burst
Next outcome, getting put in the dirt (Dead boy)
How the fuck are they king of the 6? (How?)
When none of them's king in shit (Pussy)
It was me who got A6
Man yitch that yitch in front of his bitch (Oh no)
Now we glide with brooms like witch
Spot me an opp man's letting it rip (Rip that)
War is war, no settling this (Never)
They all got touched, they ain't telling you this
[Verse 2]
Yo, Omz got punchеd in his big mouth (Big mouth)
A and Ghost got yinged down (Yinged down)
And the whitе boy got yinged down (Yinged down)
One try skate but he still got yinged down (Yinged down)
The new Nutkase, he's been around
Civ or opp man spin around (Spin it)
Either lay down or get down
It's Bun with the gun, man press out (Bun him)
Chest and head got dug out (Wah?)
All 'cause my brain did bug out (Wah?)
Pull out, bang, no runout
Bang this gun out till something get rub out (Rub that)
Chest and head got dug out
All 'cause my brain did bug out
Pull out, bang, no runout
Bang this gun out till something get rub out (Rubbed out)

[Verse 3]
I don't even know their young Gs
I don't really care for them (Fuck 'em)
Do your research on your olders
Like I would never ride for them (Never)
One got bullied at school
And the other one used to fancy men (Fish)
They've been yinged up plenty
Like each and every one of them (Woosh)
Ghost, he already got yitched (Yitch that)
A6, he already got yitched (Yitch that)
The other one nearly got yitched
But my man ran off and left his kicks (Dickhead)
Oh yeah, O Melly's a bitch
And my man lies about the life he lives (Fib)
I beg man name one man on his shizz
And tell my man don't get in the mix (Don't do it)
You might also like[Verse 4]
They all got demon rhymes (Huh?)
What they know about demon time?
I can show man demon time
When A got-got, it was no surprise (No surprise)
Let me give you some strong advice
Them man there can't defend your life (Never)
Let me give you some strong advice
Them man there can't protect your life (Never)
I can do it in squads or solos (Wah)
I'm mad in my head, gone loco (Crazy)
Been swinging my ying like zoro
Zoro, make man jump like pogo (He's jumpy)
He got left with more than cocos
Man splashed him up and his bro-bro (Splash that)
They know about me and my bro-bro
Face shot, get used as a logo (Boy)3Embed

songs.title: Gulag

description.plain: Buni sends a flurry of disses at OFB and CGM members on this track.

songs.embed_content: Read “Gulag” by Buni on Genius

body.plain: Buni sends a flurry of disses at OFB and CGM members on this track.

songs.lyrics:
23 ContributorsGulag Lyrics[Intro: Mr WOT & Buni]
Beats by Yamaica Productions, baby
Cruuuud
Maaaah
Woo-shuuuu
Ay, ay, ay
Biggz The Engineer, baby
Ay

[Verse 1]
He got boxed in the face like bitch (Bitch)
He got bun in the tum like bitch (Bitch)
You backed that wap and you didn't do shit (Mhm)
My old friends getting put in a spliff (No)
Take my name off your crusty lips
I might just dick down your auntie quick (Get friggy)
Slap this wap, everyone dismiss
You made who what? Stop smoking on shit (Some bitch)
[Chorus]
Who's these yutes from West?
Chatting my name better say it with chest (Dumb bitch)
Better go shout-out Wade for a vest
I'm tryna leave holes in tummy and chest (Boy)
I don't know who you're trying to impress
So don't get your head smashed in like Rex (Like Rack5)
Don't sleep and eat bricks, that's dead
Laugh out loud, that's a AP flex (That's funny)

[Verse 2]
You can say what you want 'bout Buni
But trust me no one's got down Buni (No)
And no one's chased down Buni (No)
And no man can violate Buni (No)
Lemme tell you one thing that's funny
Corn, corn got slapped in tummies
Hunch, I got corn for you and your cuzzy
You're gonna hold more than corn in your tummy (Bullet)
Hunch shoulda stepped and ride for his cous'
Oh shit, when his cous' got bun (Oh shit)
Oh shit, that's another one, now whose cuz can't bop for fun? (He can't walk)
I woulda told AP, "Suck your mum"
But laugh out loud, he ain't got no mum (No mummy)
Gunshot ting for any mum's son
Yo ***** go pray and protect your son, yo (Bullet)
You might also like[Bridge]
Who's these yutes from West?
Chatting my name, better say it with chest
Lemme tell you one thing that's funny
Corn, corn got slapped in tummies
Corn, corn got slapped in tummies

[Verse 3]
No talk, no verbing, trust me it's certain
Really tryna close man's curtains (Shut down)
I know the opps are burning, trust me, I'm lurking
Doing way more than hurting (Bullet)
I wanna bludclart shirt 'em, kill that vermin
Soon bump heads in person (Mhm)
This swing, you ain't firming, it's concerning
They ain't rid since that purging (He didn't)
On the 8 mans looking for opps (Mhm)
On the B mans looking for opps (Mhm)
Likkle man got put in a coff'
Cough, fast food ain't good for the opps
Ay, ay, ay, spin that block, lurk and pop
Put your whole face on a top
Try run get shot, can't miss this shot
And I pray that that prick just dropped (Bullet)
Bun man like toast, let's rock and roll
Two step like Tommy and Ghost (Mhm)
Not your average bloke, get to know
Big dizz just to match my coat (It does)
Two tap, I can get cut-throat
Do it like John Wick, skeng out the coat
Would you wanna drive the boat?
Drive the boat, got a skeng that will sink a boat (Mhm)
Don't mention gun lean, go ride for your homie's kidney (Bullet, bullet)
Anything can get bun 'cept pickney
Head-top mad and my index itchy (Mhm)
Can't stay still too fidgey
Hand gone mad and my wrist too diggy (Ching, ching)
Heard that ***** too frigey
Bad boy willy turn any gyal silly, yo (Bad bwoy)
[Outro]
Who's these yutes from West?
Chatting my name better say it with chest (Woo-shuuuu)
Lemme tell you one thing that's funny3Embed
